meanings.definition: The sediment of wine or other liquid left after fermentation.
meanings.sent1: The lees settled at the bottom of the wine barrel.
meanings.sent2: After making wine, the lees are often removed to clarify the liquid.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the lees at the bottom of the pot were the secret ingredient.
meanings.sent4: As time passed, the memories gathered in her mind like lees in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The lees in the glass shimmered like tiny jewels in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The dregs or refuse of any liquid.
meanings.sent1: He poured out the last of the coffee, leaving only the lees in the cup.
meanings.sent2: The lees of the tea had a bitter taste.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the lees in the cup were magical potion remnants.
meanings.sent4: The lees of the soup clung stubbornly to the edges of the bowl.
meanings.sent5: The lees of the river carried debris downstream, leaving a trail of waste.
